creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: center/right print; two actors in center of image; actor in front wears heavy red eye makeup, black robe with red underneath, a red obi with sword tucked in, and a blue sash around his head; actor in back wears red and blue robe with light blue headdress; print is richly colored with red, black, blue, and teal; white blossoms in background, text in cartouches in URQ
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: Upper right, center sheet: [ 歌川国梅 ]
title: Center sheet of a kabuki triptych
